column3: The Archive insists you affix the soul shard to your person.
The Archive tells me that crystal is filled with knowledge of ancient combat techniques. Might come in handy on yer excursions.
I'm still surveyin' these fortifications an' checkin' the wilds for potential dangers. Nobody's leavin' until I'm finished, ye hear?
Considering the fact you were summoned to the isle especially, I wouldn't be surprised if the soul shard yields its secrets to you. I suggest you try interacting with it.
You are currently a Phantom Freelancer. Select your chosen phantom job from the window to proceed with the expedition.

Excellent, it would seem you've managed to interface with the soul shard. There is one caveat: I believe it will only work within the confines of the island's ward. Nonetheless, as you accumulate more knowledge, you'll soon be able to draw on more potent techniques.
What's more, I don't think that's the only soul shard on the island. I'm positive you'll acquire others on your travels.
The more you possess, the greater the array of ancient techniques you will have at your fingertips.
Well, I shan't keep you from your excursions any longer, though you'd better speak to that imposing lass over there before you depart.
Ofangeim's been inspectin' the structural integrity of these fortifications. Hopefully, she hasn't found anythin' untoward, or we'll be stuck shorin' up these defenses for a spell...
There's precious little else I can tell you about the soul shards. I suggest you go and speak with Ofangeim.
I reckon ye'd better try tinkerin' with that there crystal before ye leave.
These walls have seen better days, but they're solid enough. As long as we secure the entrances, the camp'll be safe while yer out roamin' the isle.
Roamin's all well and good, but we'll need a firm plan of action if we're to make any headway.
Before ye leave, let's consider our approach.
